text.tspan: Roll 3d6 and using the table on the
left, convert the result into each
ability score. The sum is not used
days of water and food, and a

tspan.tspan: DR 16 or blind for d2 min

text.tspan: When armour is damaged penalties to
Strength and Agility tests are not modified.
You can choose to ignore all damage
from one attack but shield breaks.
It is impossible to carry more
Choose one feat from the feat
choose it. Feats can also be
rewarded to players by the DM
DR+4 on Agility, defence is DR+2
In worst case 1HP, but never less.
When your hp drops to 0 you are BROKEN, use the
damage taken, as a dice roll for the table below.
1. Hit in the gut. Lose next round coughing blood.
5. Fractured skull. Bleeding out in d4 minutes. You'll hear a ringing forever.
6. Caved-in skull. Death in d2 rounds.
7-8. Hit to chest explodes heart. Blood gushes from your mouth, eyes, and ears.
9+ Chest completely crushed. Your corpse is a blend of blood, bone, and equipment.
1. Bullet lodged in your ribcage. Remove it before acting or become infected.
2-3. Arrow to the knee. you'll limp even if you survive.
4. Nicked an artery. If you move, you will bleed out in d4 minutes.
5. You fall to the ground, test Toughness DR14 or loose movement from waist down.
6-7. Shot lodged in eye socket. Brain leaking out. Death in d2 rounds.
9+ You're dead, rippen to shreds. Blood sprays everywhere.
4-6. Limb severed. Bleeding out in d4 minutes.
7. Enemy's weapon gets stuck inside you. Death in d4 rounds.
8. Main artery slashed. Death in d2 rounds.
10+ Cut from neck to waist. Blood pools around your corpse, making ground slippery.
1. Fumes close your throat. Toughness DR12 test to act again.
4. Nose and inner ear ruined. Deaf, can't smell, or taste. Bleeding out in d6 minutes.
5-6. Skin melted. Bones turing to ashes. Death in d2 rounds.
7-8. Blackened skin. Stench of burnt meat and hair. You're dead.
9+ Burned to oblivion, along with everything you had.
1-2. Nauseated. DR+4 to any test until you drink fresh water and vomit.
3. Immune system compromised. Lose d2 Toughness.
4. Throat closes. Death in d4+1 rounds without help.
5. Black goo spills from your eyes and mouth. Suffocate in d2 min, and can't see or speak.
6-7. Multiple organ shutdown. Vomit everywhere. Death in d2 rounds.
8+ Your insides liquify. Your skin comes off in patches as you collapse.
1-2. Beast latches itself onto your arm. Automatic damage until removed.
3. Claw to the face. Eye detroyed.
4. Torn limb. Bleeding out in d4 minutes.
5-6. Shaken back and forth. Bleeding out in d2 minutes with the beast on top of you.
7. Abdomen slashed open. Guts hang and blood spouts. Death in d2 rounds.
8+ Face bitten off. Then head. Then nack. Gore galore.
(DR14 if a weapon is not meant
to be used in that way)
Defense: PC gains a free attack.
instead, d6 HP is lost daily.
Most creatures will not fight to the
last drop of blood. Roll morale if:
If you roll greater than the creature's Morale value with
2d6, it is demoralized. Roll d12 to see what they do:
7. Use a random item in panic
You start with d2 omens, and
hours. You can use omens to:
Reroll a dice roll that is not a crit
or a fumble (yours or someone else's)
1-2. Personality affected: get a bad habbit
3. Panic attack, fight, flee, or freeze.
4. Seizure for d4 rounds and chew your tounge off.
5-6. Shattered mind, babble gibberish. Decrease Prescence by 1.
7. Drop your weapons and walk crying to the nearest sharp point.
8+ Claw your eyes out and slit your own throat. Anyone who sees you takes 1 damage.
A full night's sleep restored d6 HP by default.
Sleeping in a bad place, bad weather, or without fire
A warm and steady meal doubles the healing, while
skipping a meal doesn't heal at all and makes the
Not eating or drinking for 2 days causes the character
to starve, d4 hp is lost daily.
Without sleep a character is TIRED, +2DR Agility and
Toughness every day, and they don't heal on the next
23s Stops Infection and Hemorrhage and +d4 HP
20s Removes a creature's morale for d2h. 3 doses.
20s DR14 or d6 damage + blind for one hour. 2 doses.
15s DR12 or d4 damage + hallucinations for d4 hours. 2 doses.
30s DR12 or +4DR to All Tests. 2 doses.
20s DR12 or fall asleep in d2 rounds.
d6 Bec De Corbin (heavy, Ignores Armour)
Most of these weapons fire once before
needing to be reloaded, which takes d6+2
rounds, unless otherwise stated. You can't
reload with an enemy within melee range.
Using the blackpowder weapons has LOUD and
morale when a shot if fired, Anything more
full damage in melee range or 1
damage die to each of two adjacent
full damage in melee range or 1
damage die to each of the two
6d6. Uses 9 shots per load. Roll an attack against every target in front of
you, then divide damage by the total number of targets or 3, whichever is
higher. Round up. d4+3 minutes to reload. Small Shots to load. Heavy. 1200s
4d10. Must be rolled around using a pack animal. Action to aim, Action
to fire. Deals d8 damage to the idiot standing directly behind when it
a pack animal. Action to aim,
1. You get sparks in your eyes. All Presence
tests are +2DR until next time you heal.
2. It doesn't fire. Will need to
nearby must test DR14 agility or take
7-8. All of your powder ignites. Take 1 damage for every
small powdershot, 2 for large, and d8 for cannon shot.
10-11. The weapon doesn't fire. You must
spend the next round fiddling with the

tspan.tspan: A ball of fire hits d2 creatures
2 - (2) TOUNGE OF ERIS: A creature of
your choice is confused for 10 minutes.
up to d10\*3 meters for d6 minutes.
6 - (1) NINE VIOLET SIGNS UNKNOT THE STORM: Produce
a lightning bolts dealing d6 damage at it's path.
7 - (1) METZHUOTL BLING YOUR EYE: A creature becomes invisible
for d10 rounds or until damaged, attacking/defending with DR6.
hour unless they succeed a DR14
12 - (1) IMMATERIAL FLUTTER OF TIDES: All creatures test DR12
or loose d4 hp and not be able to use Powers for d10 minutes.
Turn a creature you touch into a

text.tspan: (Numbers in brackets are the POWER cost.)

tspan.tspan: 16 - (1) RENT THE SEALS: Unlock a single lock, or disarm a trap.
Steal d6 hp from a creature.
18 - (2) SEVEN SHACKLES OF AGONY: Bind a creature
with yourself, for d4 minutes any damage dealt to
you will also be dealt to that creature.
19 - (1) MINDS VIGIL: Cause a creature to be unable
to sleep for d6-presence days, -2 to DR every day

text.tspan: When reading a scroll, test DR12 Prescence.
If you succeed, the scroll is activated and
you reduce your total POWER accordingly.
Rolling below the DR causes you to loose d2 HP,
and not be able to cast for 1h. While rolling a
Fumble causes the scroll to crumble to ashes, you
loose d4 additional HP, cannot cast for d6 days,
and must roll on the Arcane Catastrophes table.
Roll Will+d4 after resting for at
least six hours to determine how
much POWER you have that day.
Scrolls will never work with medium armour
1 GRACE OF A DEAD SAINT: d2
2 GRACE FOR A SINNER: A creature of
your choice gets +d6 on one roll.
3 WHISPERS PASS THE GATE: Ask three
4 AEGIS OF SORROW: A creature of your
choice gains 2d6 extra hp for 1 minute.
5 UNMET FATE: One creature is awakaned with
terrible memories. If the creature has been
dead for longer than 10min, or consumed by
flames, you must succeed a DR18 test, or this
8 HERMETIC STEP: You find all traps
9 Roskoe's hollow offer: Switch d2 similarly
sized creature's health, they must not have
invisible for the next d2 rounds.
13 GRACEFUL KHLOSTÜK: A creature of your
choice does double damage for d2 rounds.
14 BLIND EYES SPOKE THE TRUTH: One person speaks
whatever they are thinking, outloud for d6 minutes.
16 LIGHT OF SHE: Everyone nearby must make a
DR14 Will test, or become mad for d2 rounds.
goes up 1 tier (if d6 increases to d8), but all
agility tests are made with +2 DR.
18 THE GAZE OF HE: If the target has
morale, they go berserk for d4 turns.
19 EYES LIFT THE GATE: See the invisible and shrouded. That which
is uncovered will not disappear from your sight for d2 days.
20 DIES IRAE: Remove a Misery, BUT,
1 Perhaps it’s for the best. HE emerges from the shadows. At
least your suffering is short, almost instantaneous, as the
Effects in cursive are amplified additions to the basic effect
2-3 Roll again, but the result that you get is GREATLY amplified.
Roll again, and combine both effects. Both are amplified.
4-7 The Power works, but fate or a demonic force perverts its effects
The power is automatically a crit.
8 The scroll crumbles to tendrils of fine black powder which reach for your nose and
mouth. Make a DR14 Toughness test or lose d8 HP.
Test DR16 Will or become posessed.
9 The sky warps and stars spin like wheels. Thrown one day into the future,
you arrive vomiting time as evaporating silver bile. A Misery is fulfilled.
Thrown 2d4 days into the future, you age d12\*5 years.
10 You and a random nearby creature pass out. When you wake up, your souls have
switched. Welcome to your new flesh.
11 Your skeleton is possessed by some unearthly force and will do anything to kill
you and escape. Test Strength DR10 in stressful situations or take d4 damage.
For d2 hours a day the skeleton directs your movement, Strength DR12 to Struggle.
12 Around you falls an unending snow of black ash which only the mad can precieve. Water
sickens you from this day on. Only ash, soot, or burnt remains can quench your thirst.
Food also sickens you burying yourself for a night in ash is the only way to provide nourishment.
13 You don't regenerate, only poison heals you. You still suffer all other effects of
Thirst can only be quenched with poison.
14 The illusion of the celestial sphere is lifted, you now see what
dwells beyond. And it sees you. Roll morale when gazing at the sky.
looking at the sky causes you to become completely mad
15 One by one your teeth fall out. Long, Brittle figernails replace them in your gums.
Your smile is horrific and you find it hard to eat.
Fingernails go all the way to the back of your throat, you find it hard to breathe.
DR4 Toughness when eating or choke to death.
16 You shit out both of your femurs, take d6 damage.
Shit out your entire skeleton, 3d10 damage.
17 A clone of you appears somewhere and stalks you.
It's intelligent, mischeivous, and terribly cruel.
18 Water tries to drag you in and drown you, every time near a body of water test DR14
Strength or be dragged in and drowned.
All liquids try to cover your mouth and drown you.
19 Doors will not open for you.
You cannot pick up objects, someone must pass you them.
20 The light itself despises you. if you gaze upon a candle, lamp, or torch it goes out. DR6
Presence to not accidentaly look upon a light source.
The sun absolutely despises you, if looked upon clouds will form around it.
